reasoning: Team A addresses its critical need for a top-tier RB by acquiring an elite workhorse in Saquon Barkley. In return, Team B receives a significant upgrade at their weakest starting position with a top-3 TE in Trey McBride and also bolsters their RB depth with Tyler Allgeier. The deal allows Team A to consolidate its TE strength into a dominant RB, creating a more balanced championship contender.
